values: Glorifying God by Being Compelled by God’s LoveGlorifying God by Being Compelled by God’s Love

You are precious to God, and the greatest gift he has for you is not to let your preciousness become your god, but to enable you to make much of him as your God.You are precious to God, and the greatest gift he has for you is not to let your preciousness become your god, but to enable you to make much of him as your God.
